alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 3:06AM CST until December 31 at 10:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility down to a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Missouri, southeast Iowa and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog is expected to become widespread this morning. The fog will also be accompanied by patchy freezing drizzle, which may lead to slick spots on untreated pavement. Sidewalks, driveways, bridges and overpasses could become icy. The dense fog could linger into the afternoon in some areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
